channel.title: 2006 REMADE (SOUTH PARK)&(flavius)
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Hello guys this is the the links to the source and client to the 2006 remade that flavius released (he betraded his team) but he shut his thread down cus he wanted to go back to his team nad work on cus 2006 remade was getting lots of people so he shut his thread down but i have the source and client so im gonna release.[/size] [size=18pt]I bet South Park will be mad for releasing his source and client which he didn;t wanted to be released! [/size]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/vdg8p1.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Content][b]Combat:[/b] PvP fully complete PvN fully complete
Source: * Client: * Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Equipment requirements
[b]Magic:[/b] Every modern combat spell Can't mage through walls Alching
[b]Range:[/b] Bows/arrows Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances
[b]Prayer:[/b] All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[b]Mining:[/b] Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting Random chance of obtaining gems
[b]Smithing[/b] All bars can be made All bars can be forged into items All equipment can be produced Correct animations, interfaces and objects used
[b]Fishing[/b] All fish can be caught Big net fishing Correct item requirements Fishing spots located all around the world Correct animations Moving fishing locations
[b]Cooking:[/b] Picking wheat Filling flour bin Bread Meat Pizza Cakes Potatoes Eating food (in pieces) Correct animation and timing used
[b]Woodcutting:[/b] Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able
[b]Firemaking[/b] All logs light able Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped
[b]Crafting:[/b] Leather crafting Full tanning Pottery (fired and unfired items) Gem cutting Jewellry making Spinning wheel
[b]Runecrafting[/b] All altars working Correct multiple crafting Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras enchanting
[b]Fletching:[/b] All logs can be fletched Correct interfaces Fletch 5, 10, x, all Bow stringing Arrow&Bolt making
[b]Thieving:[/b] Stall Thieving NPC Thieving Correct anims & gfx Correct Respawn Times
[b] Slayer:[/b] Working slayer gem Working slayer shop All slayer masters
[b]Farming:[/b] All farming patch Herbs Tree farming Plant farming Potato farming ect.
[b]Herblore:[/b] All potions makeable Itentifying herbs Weapon poisioning
[b]Music:[/b] Music updating by region Music in all regions Music fades when changing sounds or region
[b]Quest:[/b] Cook's Assistant Doric's Quest Witch's Potion Rune Mysteries Tutorial island
[b]Minigames:[/b] Duel Arena Fight Caves Barrows[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/1rch9u.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2rnhams.png[/img]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/kapvt2.png[/img]
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/o91he1.png[/img]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/23vah6v.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/orp2th.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2ywtmra.png[/img]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/pojv6.png[/img]
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/xcjbdk.png[/img]
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2e3z710.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/a5ies.png[/img]
Source: * Client: *
